title: THIS IS NOT FAIR!!!
body: well today I joined in a normal server and when I clicked accept my screen went black and I had to exist the game and wait 6mins just to play again and it happened again but I got lucky on my 3rd time it worked . plz look into this.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you experienced this issue since?
yeah I find it really sad :/
This just happened to me also, waiting my 5 minutes. Hopefully it doesn't happen again.
